extends SpaceBase

      • emit

        public final void emit(io.sarl.lang.core.Event event,
                       io.sarl.lang.core.Scope<io.sarl.lang.core.Address> scope)
        Emit the given event in the given scope.

        This function emits on the internal event bus of the agent (call to doEmit(Event, Scope)), and on the network.

        Parameters:
        event - - the event to emit.
        scope - - description of the scope of the event, i.e. the receivers of the event.
        See Also:
        emit(Event)

      • emit

        public final void emit(io.sarl.lang.core.Event event)
        Emit the given event.

        This function emits on the internal event bus of the agent (call to doEmit(Event, Scope)), and on the network.

        See Also:

      • doEmit

        protected void doEmit(io.sarl.lang.core.Event event,
                      io.sarl.lang.core.Scope<? super io.sarl.lang.core.Address> scope)
        Do the emission of the event.

        This function emits the event only on the internal event bus of the agents.

        Parameters:
        event - - the event to emit.
        scope - - description of the scope of the event, i.e. the receivers of the event.
